title: New Star Guardians

embed.description: PBE Preview: Legendary Solar and Lunar Eclipse Leona , Coven Camille , Coven Lissandra Pajama Star Guardian Lux Pajama Star Guardian Ezreal Pajama Star Guardian Soraka Pajama Star Guardian Miss Fortune Pajama Star Guardian Lulu Source: https://www.instagram.com/p/Bp2R9P_FtVI/ https://www.instagram.com/p/Bp2SawNly1k/ I'm part of the official League Partner Program with Riot Games.

body:
I get adding new star guardians, but I mean come on. Give it to champions that don't already have a star guardian skin. Maybe some champs that don't already have double the skins as everyone else? I mean come on. Was there really no other champion that fit star guardian that doesn't already have one?

Quinn, Xayah, Rakan, Shyvana?

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Twix1811,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=UZKFhabF,comment-id=,timestamp=2018-11-06T20:12:46.832+0000)
>
> I get adding new star guardians, but I mean come on. Give it to champions that don't already have a star guardian skin. Maybe some champs that don't already have double the skins as everyone else? I mean come on. Was there really no other champion that fit star guardian that doesn't already have one?
> 
> Quinn, Xayah, Rakan, Shyvana?

More like, karma, Zoe, kindred, sona
holy shit now that u say it, id actually like to see a SG kindred
Agreed. Taliyah, Annie, Karma, Taric, Sona, Zoe, Kindred, Diana, or anyone else but the same champions in the skin line . . . wearing a onesie.

> [{quoted}](name=Wintertechnics,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=UZKFhabF,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2018-11-06T20:35:14.124+0000)
>
> Agreed. Taliyah, Annie, Karma, Taric, Sona, Zoe, Kindred, Diana, or anyone else but the same champions in the skin line . . . wearing a onesie.

And Zyra 😍

> [{quoted}](name=Wintertechnics,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=UZKFhabF,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2018-11-06T20:35:14.124+0000)
>
> Agreed. Taliyah, Annie, Karma, Taric, Sona, Zoe, Kindred, Diana, or anyone else but the same champions in the skin line . . . wearing a onesie.

Definitely not buying them, Riot could of made more money if they would of made them for new champions.
Yeppers. I am not giving them any money in the near future. If this is the best they can come up with by giving the same champions skins every year, there is a problem.
Urgot deserves a star guardian skin

> [{quoted}](name=Hi lm Zoe,realm=EUNE,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=UZKFhabF,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-11-06T20:25:20.531+0000)
>
> Urgot deserves a star guardian skin

He’s not getting one it doesn’t fit him, he’s too ~~~~fat.... maybe when he loses some lbs.
If you want another Urgot skin, you're better off asking for him to get one from the second Odyssey event.
Lol, it would be better than Star Guardian champions in onesies.
Keep in mind that the SG skins are essentially glorified chromas. They're the same SG lux, ez, lulu with slightly different particles.
